name: The Bridge Battler
description:
Warning: Pretty hard, and a bit flashy towards the endgame so if you have epilepsy then you shouldn't play this game (though that is the only flashy cutscene)

You suck at building bridges, so why not just smash your pathetic attempts into some goblins and defeat the reality-devouring Trollhydra that terrorizes your world?

Made for the Jame Gam #10 with One-use and Unstable Bridges

No music or sounds, sorry.

How To Play:

This game uses a one-use-combat system where every time you attack with a bridge, it breaks. Pressing any of the numbers between 1 and 6 gives you different types of these bridge weapons. Breaking a bridge gives you back the materials.

You can press down on the S key to see if any bridge slots are nearby, or to pick up any materials. Press W while pressing S to place a bridge. The R key switches bridges, and the F key destroys your current bridge (or, if S is held, the nearest bridge). 

Controls:

Esc - Exit

A / Left Arrow - Left

D / Right Arrow - Right

W / Up Arrow - Up

S - Find Slots, Combo Slot Action, Grab Ingredients

F - Destroy

S + F - Destroy Bridge at Nearest Slot

S + W - Place Bridge at Nearest Slot

R - Switch Bridges

Q - Quickly Attack

E - Hold Bridge

1 - 6 - Creates types of bridges based on whether or not you have the necessary materials. Types are detailed ingame.

Have fun.
